alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Tippecanoe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 9:38PM EDT until March 31 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carroll County in north central Indiana... Northern Tippecanoe County in west central Indiana... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 938 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oxford, or near Otterbein, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yeoman. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 178 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for north central and west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
